title: Material for producing disposable tableware or industrial goods tray and production method thereof
assignees: Shandong Lanwo Environmental Protection Tableware Co ltd

events.title: Application filed by INSTITUTE OF AUTOMATION TECHNOLOGY BEIJING CHUANGYUAN
events.assignee_search: INSTITUTE OF AUTOMATION TECHNOLOGY BEIJING CHUANGYUAN

abstract: The invention discloses a material for producing disposable tableware or industrial goods trays and a production method thereof. The material comprises the following components in parts by weight: 60-80 parts of mechanical straw pulp, 20-40 parts of chemical wood pulp or straw pulp, 2-6 parts of modified starch, 1-5 parts of waterproof agent and 0.1-1 part of oil-proofing agent. The production method comprises the following steps: uniformly mixing the components and adding water into the mixture for stirring into uniform pulp to obtain the material; adding the material to a mold and draining excess water for producing prefabricated products; putting the prefabricated products and the mold to an external mold which is heated to 170-180 DGE C by steam in advance, and closing the two molds for pressing the prefabricated products into various shapes of disposable tableware or industrial goods trays. The material mainly contains the mechanical straw pulp and has the advantages of little chemical substance contamination and low production cost. The disposable tableware or industrial goods trays produced by the material have the advantages of sanitation, low cost, favorable crispness and the like.
claims: 1, a kind of material that is used to prepare disposable food or beverage container or industrial goods tray comprises that each component of following weight portion is formed: stalk mechanical pulp 60-80 part, chemical wood pulp or straw pulp 20-40 part, modified starch 2-6 part, waterproofing agent 1-5 part and oil-proofing agent 0.1-1 part.

According to the described material of claim 1, it is characterized in that 2, the weight portion of each component is: 60 parts of stalk mechanical pulps, 25 parts of chemical wood pulp or straw pulps, 4 parts of modified starches, 3 parts of waterproofing agents, 0.5 part of oil-proofing agent.
3, according to the described material of claim 1, it is characterized in that: the blowing agent that also contains the 0.2-2 weight portion.
4, according to the described material of claim 1, it is characterized in that: also contain the inorganic filler of 0.5-20 weight portion.

5, according to claim 1 or 2 described materials, it is characterized in that: described stalk mechanical pulp is to utilize the mechanical means mill to separate the paper pulp that stalk is made; Described chemical wood pulp or straw pulp comprise sulfate wood pulp or sulphite wood pulp.

6, according to claim 1 or 2 described materials, it is characterized in that: described modified starch comprises any or more than one mixtures formed by arbitrary proportion in graft starch, crosslinked starch, oxidized starch, cationic starch or the amylodextrin; Described waterproofing agent is selected from one or more mixtures formed by any part by weight in ethyl acrylate, propyl acrylate or the butyl acrylate; Described oil-proofing agent comprises one or more mixtures of forming by any part by weight of a poly-PVF, poly-difluoroethylene or poly-trifluoro-ethylene.

7, according to the described material of claim 3, it is characterized in that: described blowing agent comprises one or more mixtures formed by any part by weight in sodium bicarbonate or the carbonic hydroammonium.

8, according to the described material of claim 4, it is characterized in that: described inorganic filler is selected from one or more mixtures formed by any part by weight in calcium carbonate granule, talcum powder, barium sulfate particle, calcined kaolin particle or the titanium dioxide particle.

10, the application of any one material of claim 1-4 in preparation disposable food or beverage container or industrial goods tray, comprising: (1) joins the excessive water of extraction in the mould with prepared material, makes prefabrication; (2) prefabrication is put into the external mold that prior usefulness is steam heated to 170-180 ℃ together with mould, matched moulds is suppressed 20-30 second, promptly.
